title: Hidden Secrets - Part 103 - Earth Report - Secret Teachings
description:
These are teachings from a Bohemian Grove Participant. THESE ARE TEACHING FROM SATAN. Although much of this tickles the ears it is ALL NEW AGE RELIGION and will lead you to Hell. 

THESE ARE FALSE TEACHINGS FROM CHANNELED SPIRITS. SOME ARE TRUE AND MANY ARE FALSE. 

ALL STATEMENTS BELOW ARE NOT MINE AND FROM THE AUTHORS

July 26, 2005

Earth Report (c) April 1, 1982
by Alson Fry
Edited by Paul Bunker
Content thanks to Alfred B. Glaser
120 pages
Scanned from the original without modification.

I ordered this *very* unusual book from my now retired friend Al Fry back in 1990.
He has authorized me to re-publish it electronically for non profit purposes.
He lives in a secluded part of Idaho, USA and is not seeking attention at this time.
I am providing it's (scanned) facsimile free of charge because I believe it's contents
may help correct the current 'illuminati' (exile) problem the planet is
currently experiencing.

The greed/domination paradigm humanity has been locked into has given us centuries
of needless war and conflict.  We can begin to terminate this sort of mania if we are
willing to dispose of our errant faith in greed, and return to a more equitable system
of global cooperation.



TABLE. OF CONTENTS ********************
Chapter A (pp. 1-7): The Exiles*** Ancient History*** Legends***

Chapter B (pp. 8-18): Knowledge & Comprehension*** Tapping In*** Memory*** the Value Grids*** Dreams*** Awareness***

Chapter C (pp. 19-25): Mind over Matter*** Our Senses & Special Abilities*** Power*** Astral Travel*** the Construction of the Universe & Matter*** the Blue Flame***

Chapter D (pp. 26-33): Psychology*** Emotions*** Hypnosis*** Happiness*** the Balancing of our Components*** our Wants & Goals*** Communication*** our Motivations***

Chapter E (pp. 34-40): The Time of Choosing*** New Perfection*** the Pole Shift*** WW III & the Holocaust scare*** Self-Responsibility***

Chapter F (pp. 41-50): The Father & Big Brother*** Printed Truth***
the Star People*** Saints & Great Teachers*** Metaphysical organizations*** Cults*** the Modern Human Comprehension Courses (Comps, for short)***

Chapter G (pp. 51-55): Governments & Politics*** War*** The U.S.***
Chapter H (pp. 56-66): Health & Medicine*** Dis-ease*** Diet*** Pain*** Healing*** the Human Aging & Growth factors*** our Appearance***

Chapter I (pp. 67-73): Reincarnation*** Karma*** Counterparts*** the Soul*** Death*** Evolution***

Chapter J (pp. 74-80): Total Self Defense (physical, emotional, mental)*** Fear***

Chapter K (pp. 81-90): Love*** Men & Women*** Relationships*** Needs & Denial*** Mutual Support of Men & Women*** Affection***

Chapter L (pp. 91-100): Sex*** Biology*** Birth & Children*** DNA*** Life & Clones*** Racial Differences*** the Earth*** Cycles & Time*** the Cells & the Brain*** Plants*** Rocks*** Animals***

Chapter M (pp. 101-106): Space*** Other Life-Forms*** UFO's*** the Benefits & Problems of Technology*** 3D or Triangulistic Math***
Chapter N (pp. 107-114): The Free & the Domination*** the Upcoming New Culture & New Perfection***


Please contribute content or funding to help keep conspiracycentral.net up and running.
I have no current part in it's administration, but it's value has already proven itself
to be vital and life changing.

Please consider seeding some of the smaller books and media items for reasonable or even
prolonged periods of time if you are able.  New people are going to need the sorts of
materials found here for many years into the future.

As an example, I decided to seed the small book selection "The Secret History of the Jesuits"
for a long period of time and it was not even my own torrent.  Nevertheless, it has been
downloaded nearly a hundred times off of my PC alone.

The times we live in appear to be turning for the worse, and I believe the only way out
of this trouble (alive) is the adoption of voluntary ethics, and the proliferation of
critical educational material.  

(LIES XXX)We do not have to fight the "New World Order".  We merely have to correct it with improved ethical procedures.(lies XXX)


Thank you, and best wishes.


  
Honesty Organized Worldwide
